@Feargal_Sharkey @CondelynneLynne @McKenzie6593 @EnvAgency @bilgribs Feargal, you continue to misrepresent this. The vast majority of that expenditure is for flood risk purposes and is ring-fenced by Defra.

@sunkfarmer @CraigBennett3 @JohnSensible @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @WildlifeTrusts Amazing how you can get rid of telegraph poles! Probably the same sort of person who will complain when the local village floods and they loose personal belongings and major acreages of habitat... when people realise how water flows around our country we’ll be a lot better off
